channel.title: Making doors work?
channel.description:
how do i make my barrows doors work properly.. here is wat i think i should add but idk...
[code]case 6741: if (objectX == 3568 && objectY == 9705) { ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, ####, -1);[/code]
idk wat the open barrows door id is for the ####

item.title: Making doors work?
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Well to find out the object id for the door search for

public void objectClick

under that type put this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your player name here")){ sendMessage("Object ID: "+objectID); }

That way, when you click the object, it will tell you the ID of that object. Then replace the #### in the code you posted with the objectID that it returns.

as for making the object, that should work.

Read full topic
